controller

Class EntityController<T>

  • Object
    • PersistenceController
      • EntityController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuestController, MenuItemController, RoomController, RoomTypeController, ServiceOrderController

    public abstract class EntityController<T>
extends PersistenceController
    An abstract base class for all controller classes that manages the lifetime of an Entity class.
    Author:
    YingHao

      • getOptions

        public List<String> getOptions()

        A list of possible options.

      • safeOnOptionSelected

        protected void safeOnOptionSelected(View view,
                        int option)
                             throws Exception
        Description copied from class: PersistenceController
        Subclasses of PersistenceController should implement this method instead of PersistenceController.onOptionSelected(View, int). For more information of what is to be implemented, please refer to Controller.onOptionSelected(View, int)
        Specified by:
        safeOnOptionSelected in class PersistenceController
        Parameters:
        view - - A view interface that provides input/output.
        option - - The option that is selected, the option value starts from 0.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getEntityName

        protected abstract String getEntityName()
        Gets the entity name of the entity managed by this Controller instance. This entity name will be used to display the available options.
        For example, if entity name is "Guest Profile"
        The following options will be displayed for user to select:
        1. Create guest profile
        2. Retrieve/Search guest profile
        3. Update guest profile
        4. Delete guest profile
        Returns:
        The name to be displayed.
